thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location for Tourist
thread.title_full: Great Location for Tourist - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ingrid9597
title: Great Location for Tourist
text: This hotel is in a great neighborhood especially if you are going to be doing the tourist sites. It is in walking distance to many sites and the tube is right there for further sites. The staff is very friendly and helpful, made dinner reservations for us and answered any questions we had. The room was a nice size for 2 adults. The rugs in the hallways are dated and need upgrading.
